There is no specific blood pressure threshold given for the comparison between office and ABPM. Instead, the categories are AOBP-ABPM>10 mm Hg (White coat effect) or ABPM-AOBP > 10 mm Hg (masked effect).  Because of this classification I assume I cannot extract data for the tables in part G.
